title: Teaching in Ocean Sciences
description: For new and/or relatively inexperienced graduate students in pedagogy of ocean sciences. Role and responsibilities of teaching in ocean sciences described and developed. Includes discussions about effective teaching methods; hands-on issues for work in the laboratory; university expectations; and regulations regarding teaching, organizational strategies, time management, and working with instructors and staff.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): graduate standing or permission of instructor. Enrollment is restricted to graduate students.
